name: js-libp2p-monorepo
description: JavaScript implementation of libp2p, a modular peer to peer network stack

scripts.reset: aegir run clean && aegir clean interop/node_modules examples/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules node_modules package-lock.json packages/*/package-lock.json examples/*/package-lock.json interop/*/package-lock.json
scripts.docs: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 aegir docs -- --exclude interop --exclude examples/auto-relay --exclude examples/chat --exclude examples/connection-encryption --exclude examples/delegated-routing --exclude examples/discovery-mechanisms --exclude examples/echo --exclude examples/peer-and-content-routing --exclude examples/pnet --exclude examples/protocol-and-stream-muxing --exclude examples/pubsub --exclude examples/transports --exclude doc
scripts.docs:no-publish: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 aegir docs --publish false -- --exclude interop --exclude examples/auto-relay --exclude examples/chat --exclude examples/connection-encryption --exclude examples/delegated-routing --exclude examples/discovery-mechanisms --exclude examples/echo --exclude examples/peer-and-content-routing --exclude examples/pnet --exclude examples/protocol-and-stream-muxing --exclude examples/pubsub --exclude examples/transports --exclude doc
